messages.body: Hi, I noticed I was charged twice for my monthly subscription to the Premium Design Templates. Can you help me resolve this double billing?
Hello! I apologize for the double charge. Let me look into your billing history right away to verify this and process a refund.

I've confirmed the double charge on your account. I've processed a refund for the duplicate payment of $29, which should appear on your card within 3-5 business days. I've also added a complimentary month to your subscription as an apology for the inconvenience.
Thank you for the quick resolution! Just to confirm - this won't affect my access to the new templates being released next week, right?

Not at all! Your subscription is active and in good standing. You'll have full access to all new templates as soon as they're released. The new collection will be available in your dashboard next Tuesday at 9am PST.
